title: NBA Bubbleball and NBA Revenue [Podcast with Washington Post]
author: ArtMap Inc.
excerpt: The Washington Post’s Ben Golliver joins Hacker Noon CEO David Smooke to discuss the process of writing his new book, “Bubbleball: Inside the NBA’s Fight to Save a Season,” and the pandemic’s impact…
text: Elijah McClain, George Floyd, Eric Garner, Breonna Taylor, Ahmaud Arbery, Michael Brown, Oscar Grant, Atatiana Jefferson, Tamir Rice, Bettie Jones, Botham Jean
